long_description: we provide instant loans to youtube creators. kreators empowers creators connect your youtube account & discover your future budget. we are creators sidekick, we support your dreams and ambition. on-demand loans for creators of all horizons. access contribute to human creativity kreators fund creators through a unique lending protocol based on blockchain to open contributions to entire world and support human creation. lock your tokens for a couple of months and fund creators 24% apy*.
generated_description: kreators is an innovative finance company that provides instant loans to youtube creators in exchange for future revenue share. they offer on-demand loans based on past activities, future growth projections, and youtube context parameters. kreators empowers creators by analyzing past activities and estimating future growth using their ai algorithm. they adjust loan parameters automatically and only take money if the creator makes money, and then re-invest part of the success in another creator's growth. kcreators funds creators through a unique lending protocol based on blockchain to open contributions to the entire world and support human creativity. they also offer a platform for creators to contribute to human creativity online instead of relying on traditional banks.
generated_business_tags: financial services for content creators | future revenue share for creators services | ai advisory services | lending platforms | blockchain-based lending protocol for content creators | instant loans for youtube creators | 24/7 assistance for creatives | on-demand loans | revenue estimator
